title: Pair of Children's Moccasins
desc: Materials: Buffalo Hide, Glass beads, Sinew; Techniques: Edge beaded, Overlay beadwork; Acquisition Source: Maj. Kenneth C. Miller, Dorothea Miller; Collection Site: File Hills; Courtesy of the Smithsonian: National Museum of the American Indian

title: Pair of Moccasins With Beaded Decoration
desc: Materials: Hide, Glass beads, Hide Thong / Babiche; Techniques: Sewn, Lazy / lane stitch beadwork, Cut; Acquisition Source: Cadzow, Donald A. (Collector); Cadzow, Donald A. (MAI Agent); Collection Site: File Hills; Courtesy of the Smithsonian: National Museum of the American Indian

title: Pair of Woman's Leggings
desc: Pair of woman's blue cloth leggings decorated with beadwork. Materials: Wool cloth, Cotton cloth, Glass beads; Techniques: Sewn, Overlay Beadwork; Acquisition Source: Cadzow, Donald A. (Collector); Cadzow, Donald A. (MAI Agent); Collection Site: File Hills; Courtesy of the Smithsonian: National Museum of the American Indian

title: Pair of Beaded Moccasins
desc: Materials: Hide, Glass beads, Hide thong/Babiche; Techniques: Sewn, Cut, Overlay beadwork; Acquisition Source: Cadzow, Donald A. (Collector); Cadzow, Donald A. (MAI Agent); Collection Site: File Hills; Courtesy of the Smithsonian: National Museum of the American Indian

title: Pair of Beaded Moccasins With Painted Decoration
desc: Materials: Hide, Paint, Glass beads, Hide thong/Babiche; Techniques: Sewn, Overlay beadwork, Painted; Acquisition Source: Cadzow, Donald A. (Collector); Cadzow, Donald A. (MAI Agent); Collection Site: File Hills Reserve; Courtesy of the Smithsonian: National Museum of the American Indian

title: Pair of Beaded Moccasins
desc: Materials: Hide, Cotton cloth, Glass beads, Hide thong/Babiche; Techniques: Sewn, Overlay beadwork; Acquisition Source: Cadzow, Donald A. (Collector); Cadzow, Donald A. (MAI Agent); Collection Site: File Hills Reserve; Courtesy of the Smithsonian: National Museum of the American Indian

title: Pair of Mens Ceremonial Leggings
desc: Pair of ceremonial leggings decorated by cutting and perforations; Hide; Techniques: Perforated; Acquisition Source: Cadzow, Donald A. (Collector); Cadzow, Donald A. (MAI Agent); Collection Site: File Hills; Courtesy of the Smithsonian: National Museum of the American Indian

title: Pair of Rabbit Skin Leggings
desc: Materials: Rabbit skin/ fur, Cotton cloth, Hide thong / Babiche; Techniques: Sewn; Acquisition Source: Cadzow, Donald A. (Collector); Cadzow, Donald A. (MAI Agent); Collection Site: File Hills Reserve; Courtesy of the Smithsonian: National Museum of the American Indian

title: Pair of Moose Skin Leggings that go with Coat
desc: Moose skin coat decorated with bead work, and pair of leggings; Techniques: Sewn,fringed; Acquisition Source: Cadzow, Donald A.; Collection Site: File Hills; Courtesy of the Smithsonian: National Museum of the American Indian

title: Pair of Coyote Skin Leggings
desc: Materials: Coyote Fur/Skin, Hide thong / Babiche; Techniques: Sewn; Acquisition Source: Cadzow, Donald A. (Collector & MAI Agent); Collection Site: File Hills; Courtesy of the Smithsonian: National Museum of the American Indian

title: Pair of Men's Moose Skin Leggings
desc: Also made with wool cloth; Techniques: Sewn, Fringed; Acquisition Source: Cadzow, Donald A. (Collector & MAI Agent); Collection Site: File Hills; Courtesy of the Smithsonian: National Museum of the American Indian

title: Pair of Medicine Moccassins
desc: Decorated with beads to represent the feet of a thunder bird. If worn by sick person they are supposed to improve in health; Hide, Wool cloth, Glass bead/beads, Hide thong / Babiche; Techniques: Sewn, Overlay beadwork; Acquisition Source: Cadzow, Donald A. (Collector & MAI Agent); Collection Site: File Hills; Courtesy of the Smithsonian: National Museum of the American Indian

title: Woman's Leggings
desc: Women's leggings of red cloth with blue and white beads, striped designs; Accession Year: 1903; Accession Number: 851; Collected by: Stephen C. Simms; Collection Site: North America, Canada, Saskatchewan, Starblanket Reserve; Courtesy of Chicago Field Museum

title: Woman's Striped Leggings
desc: Woman's leggings of buckskin, beads of red, green and white. Accession Year: 1903; Accession Number: 851; Collected by: Stephen C. Simms; Collection Site: North America, Canada, Saskatchewan, Starblanket Reserve; Courtesy of Chicago Field Museum

title: Man's Beaded, Buckskin Moccasins
desc: Moccasins (Men's) of buckskin, beaded in blue, pink, and yellow beads. Trimmed around ankles with red flannel. Accession Year: 1903; Accession Number: 851; Collected by: Stephen C. Simms; Collection Site: North America, Canada, Saskatchewan, Piapot Reserve; Courtesy of Chicago Field Museum

title: Moccasins (Man's) with Circular Design
desc: Moccasins (Man's) of buckskin, beaded with circular design on instep of foot and 'path' leading to ankle. Accession Year: 1903; Accession Number: 851; Collected by: Stephen C. Simms; Collection Site: North America, Canada, Saskatchewan, Starblanket Reserve; Courtesy of Chicago Field Museum

title: Man's Moccasins of Buckskin, Beaded

title: Man's Beaded Moccasins

title: Man's Buckskin Moccasins
